data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Cadiz at El Alcoraz.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Cadiz needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Cadiz a goal kick.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Huesca.
Alvaro Negredo scores to make it 0-1 at El Alcoraz.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 13, Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Pulido (Huesca) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Cadiz close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 23, Cadiz have a goal kick.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 26, Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Free kick Huesca.
In the minute 29, Juan Cala (Cadiz) has received a first yellow card.
Huesca are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Huesca.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 33, Jorge Pulido's header is off-target for Huesca.
Goal kick for Cadiz at El Alcoraz.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 37, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 41, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz at El Alcoraz.
Throw-in high up the field for Cadiz in Huesca.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Huesca.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Huesca.
The away team replace Jens Jonsson with Yann Bodiger.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Fali is replacing Juan Cala for the away team.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 48, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Cadiz.
At El Alcoraz, David Ferreiro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Huesca throw-in in Cadiz's half.
In the minute 53, Huesca make their first substitution with Borja Garcia replacing Juan Carlos.
Sergio Gomez is on a sub for Rafa Mir for Huesca.
The home team have replaced Eugeni Valderrama with Joaquin Munoz. This is the third substitution made today by Michel.
In the minute 54, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Huesca.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Huesca.
Alfonso Espino is booked for the away team.
In the minute 59, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Cadizâ€™s Cifuentes and play has been suspended briefly.
The match at El Alcoraz has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jorge Pulido, who is down injured.
In the minute 60, Cifuentes is back on his feet again.
Jorge Pulido has recovered and rejoins the match in Huesca.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Cadiz throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 62, Cadiz to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Huesca.
Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, Jorge Pombo (Cadiz) gets a yellow card.
Huesca drive forward but Jorge Pulido is judged offside.
In the minute 66, Cadiz have a goal kick.
Free kick Huesca.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
In the minute 69, Throw-in Huesca.
Filip Malbasic is on a sub for Alvaro Negredo for Cadiz.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Cadiz.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Huesca.
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 73, Dani Escriche is replacing David Ferreiro for the home team.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Huesca throw-in in Cadiz's half.
In the minute 75, Huesca to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz just outside Huesca's area.
Dimitrios Siovas is booked for the home team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Salvi Sanchez.
In the minute 77, Cesar Soto Grado awards Huesca a goal kick.
Salvi Sanchez for Cadiz is back on the field again.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 79, Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Cadiz drives forward and Salvi Sanchez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Huesca push upfield but Cesar Soto Grado quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 81, Salvi Sanchez (Cadiz) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Ivan Alejo.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Pombo scores with a header and the away team increase their lead to 0-2.
In the minute 83, Great play from Filip Malbasic to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Huesca.
In the minute 86, Huesca are caught offside.
Free kick Huesca.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Cadiz in the half of Huesca.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Goal kick for Cadiz at El Alcoraz.
At El Alcoraz the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Cadiz.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Cadiz.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Huesca.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
